message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think you'd be a great fit for it. I'm asking for $120 to start. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $90 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I'm looking for something a bit closer to my original price. Would you consider $105?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I would like to counter with $95 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations.
